title.rendered: Backlinks: How to Get Published in the Media without a PR Team

content.rendered:
Are you interested in getting high authority backlinks to your website and published in local media 100% free of charge? No PR required! This is going to take a little time and hustle to make happen but well worth your efforts.

3 Easy Steps to get SEO Backlinks:

Step #1 – Create a list of contacts
Step #2 – Create a “Story” worthy of the news
Step #3 – Reach out to your contacts with your story

It’s literally that easy! When submitting my story to the media I always included 3-5 high quality photographs of myself and team, dressed in my bowtie and plaid shirt in my storefront.

Often the publications would use my images because it’s easier and cheaper than sending a photographer in to take photographs. My emails to writers, editors, producers was always personal (no copy paste BS, and no mass email) and mentioned the persons name, and previous articles that they might have written on the topic. I would always include “I really enjoyed reading your last article on….”

This works! Hustle your way to the top and let me know how it works out for you. Every time you get published with my method from this day forth simply send look in the mirror and say “Chris was right” three times.

If you are looking for the best SEO company in Toronto please send me an email to nerd@anerdsworld.com today.

I wish you well on your journey to success,

 

Chris A. Hughes
